text:
Senior Technical Leader | $72,000 - $108,000 | REMOTE

Mailbird is the best e-mail client for Windows.

We are looking a Tech Leader with a great attention to detail and UX UI. Our stack includes C#, VB.Net, WPF, Git, MVVM. Our dev team is currently 4 people (12 people in total). Oh, and we organize hackathons in Bali. Does it sound interesting? Shoot us an e-mail: natalia@liv.it
